verbs.description: remington rifle settlement [V: could] face further appeals a three - judge panel of the 8th u s circuit court of appeals has approved a class action settlement in which remington arms company has agreed to replace the trigger mechanisms in millions of guns houston remington ortrie d smith lewis frost united states courts of appeals remington arms todd hilsee richard barber w mark lanier richard denney
